methods.name: HeapHandle
methods.logic: Deleted copy constructor to prevent copying of HeapHandle objects.

methods.name: operator=
methods.logic: Deleted assignment operator to prevent assignment of HeapHandle objects.

methods.name: HeapHandle
methods.logic: Default private constructor. Only internal classes can instantiate this class.

methods.name: is_incremental_marking_in_progress
methods.logic: Returns the current status of incremental marking. Indicates whether incremental garbage collection is currently active.

methods.name: is_young_generation_enabled
methods.logic: Returns the current status of the young generation. Indicates whether the young generation (nursery) is enabled for garbage collection.
